name: MonsterArena
short_description:
I was always interested in making games, and I successfully modded another game but that is not what I want to do. I want to write my own game. So I made this as my first game.

This is more of a challenge than anything else. It is just to  see if I can develop a (hopefully fun)game written in only scripting languages. Right now it is called Monster Arena and when it is up and running it will be a gladiator style game where you fight monsters and return to the stalls to buy weapons, armor, etc.
summary: A Game written entirely using Scripting languages(No Compiling)
